price: 191. Ama koros agleytiitiy tu gine wayta Yallat agleh haytaa?Qibaadal is isih ginnimteemih anuk.
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
